name: Landslide (itch) (Sothar, Adinimys, AlbinJohansson)
description:
"During a DND session, you felt from a zepplin on the way to the capital city because of an action you proposed. The angry DM decided to punish your character by making him fighting for his life against some monsters before the mountain fall."

DO NOT FALL ! DEFEND YOURSELF !!

---------------------------

Using a CONTROLLER is the intended way to play this game

KEYBOARD
----------------------------
CONTROLER

MADE IN 72H FOR THE LUDUM DARE #51

THEME: "EVERY 10 SECOND"
OUR GAME: "Every 10 second, some parts of the level fall."
ROLES:
ADINIMYS - Developer
ALBIN - Sound Designer
SOTHAR - Graphist

Credits :

Using input glyphs from Nicolae (Xelu) Berbece : https://opengameart.org/content/free-keyboard-and-controllers-prompts-pack

Music from AlbertFernandez (Percussive Music Pack) : https://godotmarketplace.com/shop/percussion-music-pack/
